languages.text: "Еще раунд, Ваша Светлость?" {n}Парень с почтением склоняет голову и чуть улыбается.{/n} "Мудрые гости с палуб повыше говорят, что игра помогает не только расслабиться, но и испробовать разные тактики. Познать себя и других".

"Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."
languages.original_text: "Еще раунд, Ваша Светлость?" {n}Парень с почтением склоняет голову и чуть улыбается.{/n} "Мудрые гости с палуб повыше говорят, что игра помогает не только расслабиться, но и испробовать разные тактики. Познать себя и других".

To learn more about others and yourself."

They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

"Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

languages.text: « Une autre partie, Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}demande l'homme en inclinant la tête, un léger sourire au bord des lèvres.{/n} « J'ai entendu des visiteurs d'en haut dire que ce jeu était bien plus qu'un simple passe-temps. Apparemment, c'est l'occasion de tester différentes stratégies et d'en apprendre plus aussi bien sur les autres que sur soi-même. »
languages.original_text: "Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Une autre partie, Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}demande l'homme en inclinant la tête, un léger sourire au bord des lèvres.{/n} « J'ai entendu des visiteurs d'en haut dire que ce jeu était bien plus qu'un simple passe-temps. Apparemment, c'est l'occasion de tester différentes stratégies et d'en apprendre plus aussi bien sur les autres que sur soi-même. »

languages.text: «¿Otra ronda, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}El hombre inclina la cabeza con una leve sonrisa.{/n} «¿Sabe? He oído a visitantes más sabios de las cubiertas superiores comentar que este juego ofrece algo más que un simple divertimento. Dicen que brinda la oportunidad de poner a prueba distintas estrategias. De averiguar cosas sobre los demás y sobre uno mismo».
languages.original_text: "Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

traits.locale_text: «¿Otra ronda, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}El hombre inclina la cabeza con una leve sonrisa.{/n} «¿Sabe? He oído a visitantes más sabios de las cubiertas superiores comentar que este juego ofrece algo más que un simple divertimento. Dicen que brinda la oportunidad de poner a prueba distintas estrategias. De averiguar cosas sobre los demás y sobre uno mismo».

languages.text: 「もう1度どうですか、陛下？」{n}男は微笑みながらお辞儀をする。{/n}「上層デッキの賢いお客様が、このささやかなゲームはただの娯楽なんかじゃないと言っていました。色々と戦略を試すチャンスだと言うのです。他の人間や自分自身をよく知るのに良いのだとか」
languages.original_text: "Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「もう1度どうですか、陛下？」{n}男は微笑みながらお辞儀をする。{/n}「上層デッキの賢いお客様が、このささやかなゲームはただの娯楽なんかじゃないと言っていました。色々と戦略を試すチャンスだと言うのです。他の人間や自分自身をよく知るのに良いのだとか」

languages.text: “要不要再来一轮，大人？”{n}吹笛人微微一笑，低下了头。{/n}“如您所知，我听上层甲板的智者说过，这个小游戏带来的并不仅仅只有娱乐。他们说这是个测试不同策略的好机会，可以更好地了解别人，了解自己。”
languages.original_text: "Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

traits.locale_text: “要不要再来一轮，大人？”{n}吹笛人微微一笑，低下了头。{/n}“如您所知，我听上层甲板的智者说过，这个小游戏带来的并不仅仅只有娱乐。他们说这是个测试不同策略的好机会，可以更好地了解别人，了解自己。”

languages.text: "Noch eine Runde, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Der Mann neigt den Kopf mit einem kleinen Lächeln.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, weise Besucher von weiter oben haben gesagt, dass dieses kleine Spiel mehr bietet als nur Unterhaltung. Sie sagen, es sei eine Gelegenheit, verschiedene Strategien auszuprobieren. Um mehr über andere und sich selbst zu erfahren."
languages.original_text: "Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Noch eine Runde, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Der Mann neigt den Kopf mit einem kleinen Lächeln.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, weise Besucher von weiter oben haben gesagt, dass dieses kleine Spiel mehr bietet als nur Unterhaltung. Sie sagen, es sei eine Gelegenheit, verschiedene Strategien auszuprobieren. Um mehr über andere und sich selbst zu erfahren."

languages.text: "Bir tur daha oynar mısınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?" {n}Adam, hafif bir gülümsemeyle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ne var, biliyor musunuz? Yüksek makam sahibi, akıllı ziyaretçilerden bu oyunun salt eğlenceden çok daha fazlasını sunduğunu işittim. Bunun farklı stratejileri denemek ve hem diğerlerini hem de kendini daha iyi tanımak için bir fırsat olduğunu söylüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Another round, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The man bows his head with a slight smile.{/n} "You know, I've heard wise visitors from higher up say that this little game offers more than just amusement. They say it's an opportunity to test different strategies. To learn more about others and yourself."
